summary: BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria, but the diff implements extensive changes around Internet Identity auth flow, onboarding routing, diagnostics, UI theming, routing, and SPA fallback behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented/expanded Internet Identity (II) auth flow logic on Login/Signup including attempt phases, stalled auth detection, mobile patched login, post-auth timeouts, diagnostics, and canister warmup.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest; these are new behaviors added without an explicit request.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/mentioned a new route `/signup-test` and multiple routing/layout changes (TanStack Router root layout and child routes).
Changed onboarding flow to rely on localStorage and redirect logic without backend onboarding status calls; related context/provider logging and persistence helpers.
Introduced/changed global UI theme assets: OKLCH chocolate-inspired color tokens, global typography rules, custom Tailwind font families; adjusted carousel/card heights to prevent text clipping.
Added SPA fallback 404 behavior and index.html startup script configuration for `process.env.II_URL` with fallback and warning.
Removed/disabled legacy AI configuration/client, routing AI calls through an external proxy client instead.
Removed password auth provider from RootLayout and wrapped app with onboarding/II callback handler providers.
Added/updated project state metadata describing a pending feature request AR-1 about clearing delegations before Login/Signup and routing based on onboarding completion.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest itself lists no requirements; this introduces a new feature request record beyond the provided request scope.
